website_summaries.verdict: Unique anti-UV umbrella with inner coating; blocks heat out even when standing in the sun.
pros: Good for those with sun-related medical issues
Black vinyl liner reflects, filters 99% of UV rays
cons: Some users report noise when opening or closing

customer_reviews.title: We carry this all the time We’re outside
customer_reviews.text: My wife had 3 basal cell carcinomas on face since moving to California. So She tried carrying the "fashion" size Coolibar umbrella every day. Then lost it and i bought her this umbrella as a replacement. At first she was embarrassed to carry around this big tent big enough for 2. Also found it rather heavy for her. But now She enjoy the fact it screens her arms and hands as well as head. The heck with what anybody else thinks. She happily carry It wherever she goes! And it also works for the rain and water proof. Very good umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Lashello

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Great UV Protection
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a quality 100% UV resistant umbrella but this is it. My wife has to avoid strong sunlight and living in Texas it's tough. Have bought others advertised in the past but limited protection. This is classy looking with a dark inner lining and well made at a very reasonable price and fast delivery. This is the real deal for those seeking real UV protection as well as staying dry.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well, very large though
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job at blocking the harsh sun. I walk a lot, and I am much cooler, less sweaty, and not sunburnt when using this. I would prefer it to be a little smaller, but that's not a flaw. It requires a bit of force to snap back into compact position (though the top portion does auto-close, you have to pull it down to connect with the handle before you can use auto-open again). I kind of fear accidentally pressing the close or open button at a bad time, but that's yet to happen.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: Packaging contents were very good. Product is easy to open and close. Umbrella is nice and clean. I feel cool under it. Con's: The stick (pole) of the umbrella seems to wobble a little. While holding it straight, I can feel the pole strain and feel unsteady under the weight of the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reduced the heat of the sun.
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella so much that I went and bought a 2nd one. It keeps the heat down so much when I used it in the sun shielding myself while standing in line at the Disney parks. Loved it. I told me girl friend to buy it as we both hate standing in line at the parks & being burned up in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good sun umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before my trip to middle east knowing I need some shade under the sunny weather. It is a great travel umbrella, lightweight and good size, easy to carry around in the backpack or purse.
customer_reviews.author: Wei-nong Wang

customer_reviews.title: I wish they had better patterns but great umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a fan of any of the patterns they had but I really like the umbrella. Opens by itself with the press of a button, made from thick material, and compact to fit in my small backpack. I couldn't get it back in the slip it comes with once I opened it for the first time, but I didn't really need that anyways since it closes with the velcro strap so I just threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Tenorio

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully for deflecting the sun
customer_reviews.text: I use this umbrella for walking around Phoenix during the extreme hot summer months to shade me from the sun. Works wonderfully for deflecting the sun. It's overall a solid umbrella, great structure that is not too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Y

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY AND PRACTICAL UMBRELLA!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my new umbrella - It keeps out the UV rays from the sun - I have been advised by my doctor NOT to get any sun - I got MORE than enough radiation when I had cancer! Thanks for producing (and making available for purchase) not only a practical - but a very pretty umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella!! So compact! Easy open and close. Should work great to keep me cooler during the hot summer months.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: I think this umbrella is so cute and I love the black shaded underside.... I'll be using this all spring & summer at my kids games to stay cooler and protected from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: be aware, you must be careful when you are folding this umbrella. Last week when I tried to push the rod in and missed a grip, the rod of the umbrella shoot back out with an extreme force and hit my face. I was diagnosed with facial contusion, and bruise and heavy swelling persisted for days. PLEASE BE CAREFUL. otherwise I liked this umbrella, but it broke on me after just over a months of light use. The umbrella is locked in half fold position and I can't open nor close this umbrella at this point. I regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: True UV protection
customer_reviews.text: Took this for a test run at an amusement park and it kept me cool all day. It is a little bit rickety and wobbly and a strong gust of wind made me have to turn it in a different direction so it wouldn't bend backwards. Used it in the rain too and my head didn't get wet. The Velcro tabs are not in correct alignment so I need to remove one and move it closer to the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice umbrella ! I took it to Europe on a tour to Spain , Portugal and France and it was great in the sun! Provided good shade and sun protection . It’s not that compact nor lightweight but it was small enough to fit in my Travelon bag on the outside pocket . It was wide enough to shade 2 people but best for just one! People on my tour admired it and asked where I bought it because they liked the black undercoating .
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Broke despite light use
customer_reviews.text: I am an occasional tour guide in the Northeast. When conducting tours in DC in the summer I want sunlight protection. I purchased this umbrella two years ago and must have used it 20 times for one hour at a time, just to protect myself from the sun. A couple of times I used it for rain. Total use: probably 20 hours. Yet, it broke, despite minimal use. While I used it, I felt it did a good job blocking the sun. It is small when folded, but heavier than other small umbrellas I've had. Would I buy it again? No, because it should not break after 20 uses just for opening it and closing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Rezk

customer_reviews.title: This product is extremely fragile and I would NOT recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this umbrella to shield my baby from the sun while carrying her but after only about 5 times, it's already broken. The wire part started breaking off and I tried to keep using it but it was sticking out so much that I was worried it would poke our eyes off. I ended up throwing it away in the trash. This product is extremely fragile and I would NOT recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely upset, because I had an amazing umbrella that was good for the sun, great for the rain and now it broke only after a few months after using it .... and it didn’t break in the rain or in the strong wind or falling down ... no, it broke just because I was pushing the button to open it ... it just snapped .... broke right in my hands ..... very very upsetting and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this umbrella. It is made cheap and isn't large enough at all. Not an spf umbrella. Flimsy. It will not last very long. It should have been 5$ instead of the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille W.

customer_reviews.title: It’s delicate
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for 2 years now. I live in a sunny location where it rarely rains. I bought it for sun protection more than for rain. I’ve used this on maybe 4 or 5 occasions. I have it as a backup for when using my 68” sun umbrella isn’t practical. I went to use it this morning and it won’t stay open. Nothing is bent or torn. It’s in pristine condition. It mostly hangs in a closet. So, for $20 and 5 uses i’d have been better off getting an umbrella at the dollar store each time I needed to use it.
customer_reviews.author: FeistyRunner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella bends with the wind very easily. It also doesn’t seem to block the heat from the sun. I had purchased a different sun blocking umbrella a few years ago with a silver lining and you could immediately feel the difference when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Christel Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: On hot days, this keeps me cool and keeps my skin from getting tanned or burned. I'm one of those people who overheat easily and sweat a lot, so I really appreciate how effective this parasol is. I like it so much that I'm going to donate my regular umbrellas to Goodwill because I don't think I have any use for them any more. Why continue to use ta regular umbrella when you could use one like this that will protect you from sun exposure as well as rain? It's so much more versatile. The push-button operation works perfectly, and the umbrella is sturdy, not flimsy. I think it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty's mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: It's a great umbrella but it got stuck very quickly after purchasing it.. Soon after I want able to close it properly. Nice looking tho.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa R.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD UV UMBRELLA
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella, good value. Seems sturdy, although I have only used it once. Very decorative also, love the fringe detail. Nice to have a UV protective umbrella that does not look "industrial".
customer_reviews.author: sromanyk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT sun umbrella! As someone with heat intolerance and someone who's body doesn't like the sun, it was a GAME CHANGER. I was able to go to the beach and tubing with my family while on vacation! Protected me from sunburn! And worked well in the rain too! Definitely waterproof and quick drying (I accidentally dropped it in the river while tubing haha). Super easy to use with the push button! AND it's SUPER cute!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Edna Parker

customer_reviews.title: Trust me, you want it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to protect myself and my 5 month old when we were on vacation at the Grand Canyon. It was superb! We were both shaded from harmful UV rays (in addition to SPF sunscreen) and it was at least 10° under the umbrella. My husband was amazed and agreed it was the best purchase of the whole trip. And it was super adorable! We received many compliments on style and ingenuity. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover or protect well.
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this umbrella, it's too small and does not protect from the sun enough. I like it's light way and how it's packaged but it only covers my head and shoulders. It does not cover two people.
customer_reviews.author: PebblesR

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously small handle even for a Woman
customer_reviews.text: Likes: I liked the color and the strong opening and closing, after I got the cheap cover off. The cover snagged on two of the ribs while coming off and I don't see how you could ever get it back on after using the umbrella. Dislikes: The handle is terribly small even for a woman's hand. Without a doubt this is the cheapest made umbrella I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: DamonT

customer_reviews.title: Not wind resistant at all.
customer_reviews.text: It is not wind resistant. I already get made fun of for having a walking umbrella to project me from the sun but when the wind picks up, it flips up! My walking buddies giggle every time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to get the umbrella to lock in place and stay opened. It appears to be broken---either that, or a really poor design. The fabric smells bad, too. Just threw it in the trash. Not even worth the hassle of trying to return.
customer_reviews.author: Grace V. Tretter

customer_reviews.title: Takes the sun like a champ
customer_reviews.text: The only negative thing was that it smelled horrible when I opened the package. I had to spray the package with deodorant and febreeze. Must have been something wrong with the packaging. Once I did that though, I've been taking this thing with me everyday for 3 weeks. Handles hot July sun like a beast. I love it. I'm pretty rough on it, so I expect it to last me maybe a couple more months.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T.

customer_reviews.title: nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice umbrella. my old umbrella died so a replacement was required. This is handy that the umbrella retracts at the push of a button. This is handy when speed is required when closing it - such as getting into a car or onto a train or bus. The action works well.
customer_reviews.author: vincent8

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 2 uses. So unfortunate because the sun blocking fabric is top notch. The mechanics of the umbrella are flimsy and mostly non functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great sun protection, but quickly breaks
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella was lightweight and easy to carry, and offered decent sun protection. However, it is quite difficult to close, and broke after less than 10 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella. I use it all the time for shade and rain. Lightweight, regular size. It has a cute stitching on the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Flawida

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bulky and heavy. I returned it because It has a few plastic parts on it's frame. I am not sure if they will make the umbrella less durable.
customer_reviews.author: Di Chen

customer_reviews.title: Rain or Sun, You're Protected
customer_reviews.text: This " sunbrella" is helpful in rainy or super sunny weather. I like the design of the umbrella I purchased for myself and gifted a friend who really likes the pattern on her umbrella. Small and easy to carry, keep stowed in the car, or pack into a purse while on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Reader813

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is of very poor quality, barely lasted about 3 months. Do not throw your money into a product of such poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Used this during my travel in Europe during a heat wave of 100F+. Small, compact for my backpack & tote bag. Truly does keep you cooler. Circumference good for one person. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Maui Girl 94526

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality,  bought 3, 2 broke!
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella seemed like a great product and thus I bought 3 for my family. Less than 3 month after 2 use for one of them and first use for the other... two of them broke! Terrible quality
customer_reviews.author: RYang

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Compact Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great little umbrella. It is sturdy. Really protects you from the sun. It takes more effort than expected to close it. This is the only draw back. It took a few weeks to brake it in.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Deloire

customer_reviews.title: I love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Made very well, and really protects. Used it in Spain. The sun was extremely strong at an outdoor event. This umbrella proved to provide great protection, and it is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: A. NORMAN

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this umbrella while hiking with baby in a carrier. It keeps the sun off him and he hasn't had any sunburn. Holds up well against wind. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Held up in sun, rain, and hail.
customer_reviews.text: Got caught in a hail storm on my way home and this sucker didn't flip inside out. I may have been soaked, but I was impressed. In normal rain, it holds up great. Lots of coverage. In the sun, it's excellent for providing shade. The black underside keeps as much sun out as possible. Keeps me 20 degrees cooler while waiting at the bus stop.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very noticeably blocks the heat from the son which is what I wanted. Haven’t used it in inclement weather yet, but that isn’t why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons Lacrosse game. It was a little breezy Not windy but the umbrella felt like it wanted to bend. Did offer good sun protection though. It's nice and compact fit in my purse. Am overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protector
customer_reviews.text: It really protects me from the sun while I take my walks & it’s light to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Boria-Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Portable and effective. Great little parasol to block oit damage from the rays of the sun. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Webstercat

customer_reviews.title: It's an expensive umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Am expensive umbrella.. thought I give it a try as many commented how it'll lower the temperature under the sun.. Didn't necessary be the case...
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the summer
customer_reviews.text: I've had to be out in the hottest, sunniest part of the days this summer and this sun blocking umbrella has helped me get through it. I hope to never be without it.
customer_reviews.author: RCGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who felt as if she were baking in the sun. She has told me so many times how much she loves it and how it truly made her feel cooler while walking. She was thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Webb

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. Easy to assemble. Only been using a few days. Good so far!
customer_reviews.author: cooper

customer_reviews.title: Lasted three months and 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and flimsy product. Within four uses the opener broke and the umbrella was unusable. I would send this back today, but it looks like the "window" of 30 days has passed. Don't buy this product, unless you are seeking a "one time use" umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl M.

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Good sun protection, but broke immediately with first use on vacation, which left us without.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for UV protection and lightweight, this is a good one. Another plus is the size- needed something for walking- this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is very beautiful and the quality is very good. Light and portable with convenience. Not only can you fold the sun, but you can also cover the rain. The more you look, the more you like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Warranty Service
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is made of excellent and sturdy quality material. Wish they did the same with the metal frame. The umbrella is excellent for light use (e.g. sun or light rain), but do not hold it against heavy winds as the frame will likely not hold. The company provides excellent and very quick warranty service, so I would not hesitate to buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: It was impossible to close this umbrella with one hand as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great protection from  the sun!
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella did it's job very nicely. It was just about the right size and not too heavy. It also was nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Marie D.

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella is great because it is quite sturdy against a strong wind
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is great because it is quite sturdy against a strong wind. It is also built quite solidly and since it is white it matches every color outfit that I wear. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, one of the ribs broke within couple of months, and just before an year, the spring broke so wont open.
customer_reviews.author: madan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, seems high quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier and higher quality than other umbrellas I've tried. The trade-off there is that it's a bit heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella Awesome Rain or Shine
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella has saved me getting toasted while doing my afternoon walks in the hot Hawaiian sun. It also keeps me dry during the intermittent showers too! I love this umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It’s durable in both a rainy and a sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Ultraviolet

customer_reviews.title: Quick deploying and cute, slightly hard to close
customer_reviews.text: Good sunproof umbrella, automatic deployment works well and has no issues after several months of use. Cute colors, slightly hard to shut back into itself but not really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for watching Tennis Matches in the heat of Orlando, Florida!
customer_reviews.author: Kingoftennismedia

customer_reviews.title: Beat the heat with this umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used an umbrella for shade, it was the best and it really blocked the heat. It was worth it to stay cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope 😜

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you walk a lot outdoors. Sometimes hat just don't do the trick on a sunny day. And of course also good for rain.
customer_reviews.author: ljh

customer_reviews.title: Does what it supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Used it in a very hot weather where the sun just gets on you. Used this umbrella and helped to keep the sun away. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cavin Schon

customer_reviews.title: Affordably perfect
customer_reviews.text: Using it for soccer games, it is considerably cooler under it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy J

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate. Push button open and push button close. Rain and UV protection.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great I’ve protection
customer_reviews.text: Great product keeps heat out and protects you from UV rays , compact makes it easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Received this a few months ago, used it several times in wind and calm weather. Works fine. Good Rain and sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use but it could have been the kids abusing my poor umbrella...
customer_reviews.text: Kids used my umbrella and one of the stems broke... all in all, its lightweight and still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! It broke after a few use...it should have cost $5 ...waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: gloria loayza

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend that has skin problems. It’s very classy looking and feels sturdy. Protects from the harmful rays... perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the sun off when walking from parking lot to store.
customer_reviews.author: Glorietta

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, not durable
customer_reviews.text: Great while it lasted. Broke after a couple of months. I wouldn't recommend for windy areas.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great sun umbrella with uv protection. Bought it as a sunbrella for walking. It blocked the sun as described. And out of my expection it is very sturdy. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nagusen

customer_reviews.title: Stay cool
customer_reviews.text: Very good sun umbrella with appropriate size to protect me from the sun. The degree under the umbrella is much lower than outside. The umbrella has an automatic button is easy to open and close with a simple press of the button. I’m happy with it, will order again.
customer_reviews.author: denault

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: works well for uv protection and also as an ordinary umbrella. auto open feature is great, but not a must. mine breaks a bit in a thunderstorm after a year of usage, but still usable. worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Yiwei Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Good size for golf
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the look. I don’t like that you have to push it all the way closed and compact before you can open it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light weight sun umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I like the material and it’s not too heavy and it does help with the heat of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy flower

customer_reviews.title: Broke soon after purchasing unable to return
customer_reviews.text: Was great until it broke 6 weeks after I bought it. It’s 9 days past return window, can not return useless umbrella. WOULD NOT BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Christien Fuson

customer_reviews.title: Small, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Excellent small, lightweight umbrella. I use it on the golf course. Very handy auto open and close.
customer_reviews.author: AZ golfer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to close
customer_reviews.text: I find it very difficult to close. You can press the button to collapse it but getting the stem back down is hard. It also has a chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to close but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed about how hard it is to close. You really have to use some force to close it. Not good for opening and closing frequently. Better if you will just have it open for a while. Other than that it is sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and took it on my three mile walk. Much better sun protection than the cheaper parasol I have been using for years. The compact size when closed will make it easy to take when traveling. Wish I had ordered it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Likes to know

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fabric, it is smooth, very clean looking !!
customer_reviews.author: Kielle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really helps on a hot, sunny day but it is not compact. Big and heavy!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This uv umbrella is exactly what we need. It's lightweight and sturdy, easy to carry anywhere. The anti-uv cloth provides a comfortable shade, I can feel much cooler under it.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Compact Sun Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: A compact strong sun umbrella for summer, it is doing amazing at protecting me from the harmful uv rays. My sister bought one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Namara

customer_reviews.title: Just like it
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is very useful, it can be used for rain, my sister and I go to the park lawn to read books can also use the sun block,and nice delivery men,haha
customer_reviews.author: Taylor L Smith

customer_reviews.title: great for uv protection
customer_reviews.text: This is the best umbrella I have ever owned. Perfect size, good material, easy open & close with push button. The double-layer coating works great in shading me from the sun. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Welcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sun
customer_reviews.text: Love the umbrella it really does help with the sun! I use it everyday the only thing it’s hard to close it
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: very good sun umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella works in blocking the sun as I feel much cooler under it. Though when folded it is not as small as a five fold umbrella, but it is small enough to put in my purse and save a lot of time to put it in order.
customer_reviews.author: K.M

customer_reviews.title: the umbrella tube shoots out like a small air gun
customer_reviews.text: There are two major flaws with this product - When you push the auto release button, the umbrella tube shoots out like a small air gun, someone could get hurt if he stood in front of it. Secondly, you definitely need some muscle power to retract it when you are done using it.
customer_reviews.author: tw

customer_reviews.title: practical
customer_reviews.text: Very practical, rainy days and the sun day are very useful
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSam

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The sun umbrella is very compact, and not heavy. The uv coating is effective in blocking the sun. I bought it as a gift for my mom, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: diquan

customer_reviews.title: a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: as i said in headline the quality of the umbrella cannot worth the price of it
customer_reviews.author: fan for muji

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella broke after one month.
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella does provide good sun protection. Unfortunately, mine broke after one month, and I had only used it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

product_meta.title: Rainbrace Windproof,Waterproof,UV Protection Umbrella-Superior Automatic Umbrella Defies High Wind,Sun&Rain-Perfect Folding UV Umbrella Parasol with Anti-UV Coating
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :2.36 x 2.36 x 10.63 inches; 9.59 Ounces
 * Date First Available :July 7, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Rainbrace
 * ASIN :B073S3S22R

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #89,202 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #79 inFolding Umbrellas 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.2 out of 5 stars209 ratings
feature_bullets: [UPF50+ SUN PROTECTION] Super waterproof pongee fabric canopy with a new black vinyl layer inner coating which filters out almost 99% direct UV and reflect it away. The black inner lining works best than any other colors in absorbing indirect UV rather than concentrating it onto your head and face. This umbrella will keep the heat out even when standing in the sun.

[WATERPROOF & WINDPROOF ] This travel sun & rain umbrella has been tested up to 60 mph. With 8-Ribs structure which is engineered by high-grade stainless steel and flexible fiberglass strictly in the line, it provides all parts works flexibility to fights the wind. Meanwhile, canopy opens to 38.58" /98cm in diameter, big enough to provide you with superior protection from the rain and sun when travel or outdoor walk.

[COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT] When folded, the umbrella is quite small (10.63 " /27cm long) that it can easily fit into most handbags, backpacks, briefcases, car etc. And you can put it in a storage bag, your hand bags won't get wet. Lightweight design (0.86 pounds/390g) makes it perfect for both men and women to use while traveling.

[ADVANCED AUTOMATIC] Automatically open and close with just one press button allows for easy one-handed operation, very convenient. And the high quality rubber handle provides you with a good non-slip grip for those windy rainy days.
[TOP CUSTOMER SERVICE]If you have any issues about our new umbrella,do not hesitate to contact us.Best customer service and best in customer satisfiction.
